attributes.action: That the recently increased duty on fuel should be cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent increase in fuel duty by 2p per litre has led to most fuel prices being quoted above £1 per litre.
For hauliers this is a particular problem as they already operate on such tight profit margins.
For the average family, the cost of filling up a family car has increased by more than £10 per tank.
Therefore, in order to save many hauliers from going out of business and to protect our transport infrastructure, we the undersigned would like to see fuel duty cut to ease the pressure on the public as a whole and to protect our economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
